comments.body: Would suggest adding this to the GitHub repo as well. Then we can just grab it directly from the source in the future
As soon as we get this recipe going I will add the license and cut a new release of the package to include it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'GENESIS 1.3 is a time-dependent three-dimensional FEL code.'

comments.body:
This shouldn't matter, but maybe it helps Conda recognize `build` and `host` are separate. Thinking maybe Conda is confused about our requirements and thus has issues installing this package into the test environment.

```suggestion
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}        # [win]
  host:
  run:
```

    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}        # [win]
  host:
  run:
